name: (Not So Super) Powers
description:
Pd. Controls: WASD and numbers 1 to 4, but you can change them in the options menu

Help our masked hero .... wait ... is that a mask? What is he wearing on his head? Anyway ... help our hero to rescue the hostages that the aliens have taken in their invasion.

Unlock new superpowers to avoid and destroy your enemies, but remember, superpowers are not always helpful, sometimes they have disadvantages that you must master.

One of your superpowers is teleporting, it could be an excellent superpower if it weren't for a little detail ... you teleport to a random position.

Teleportation? Flying? Discover what superpowers (not so super in fact) you can unlock in your adventure against the alien threat.

Have fun and good luck :D
